name: wifi-billing-system
description: WiFi billing system with captive portal, RADIUS authentication, and mobile payment integration

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.copy:frontend: mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/build/* backend/public/ || (md backend\public 2>nul & xcopy /s /e frontend\build\* backend\public\)
scripts.railway:build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npm install --only=production && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd .. && node prebuild.js && cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
